instructions: Resolve 37 lint/type errors reported by available tools.
Increase test coverage with more assertions.
Fix 37 lint/type issues noted in reliability analysis.
Reliability blockers: Coverage below target threshold.; Mutation score below target..
Fix 37 lint/type issues noted in reliability analysis.
PRIORITY: Increase test coverage to meet the target of 90%.
PRIORITY: Improve mutation score to meet the target of 50%.
Coverage: Identify and write tests for all functions that are currently not covered. Focus on the 15 functions, especially those with complex logic.
Coverage: Add unit tests for edge cases in the main class, particularly for any conditional branches and loops.
Coverage: Ensure that all public methods are tested, especially those that handle user input or external data.
Mutation: Create tests that specifically target edge cases and error conditions to increase the mutation score. For example, test how the system behaves with invalid inputs.
Mutation: Implement tests that cover all branches of conditional statements in the code, especially in functions with high complexity.
Mutation: Add tests that simulate failure scenarios to ensure that the code can handle unexpected situations.
Quality: Address the 37 lint issues identified in the static analysis. Prioritize fixing issues that affect readability and maintainability.
Quality: Refactor complex functions to reduce cyclomatic complexity. Aim to break down functions with high complexity into smaller, more manageable pieces.

priority_issues: Increase test coverage to meet the target of 90%.
Improve mutation score to meet the target of 50%.
coverage_suggestions: Identify and write tests for all functions that are currently not covered. Focus on the 15 functions, especially those with complex logic.
Add unit tests for edge cases in the main class, particularly for any conditional branches and loops.
Ensure that all public methods are tested, especially those that handle user input or external data.
mutation_suggestions: Create tests that specifically target edge cases and error conditions to increase the mutation score. For example, test how the system behaves with invalid inputs.
Implement tests that cover all branches of conditional statements in the code, especially in functions with high complexity.

code_quality_suggestions: Address the 37 lint issues identified in the static analysis. Prioritize fixing issues that affect readability and maintainability.
Refactor complex functions to reduce cyclomatic complexity. Aim to break down functions with high complexity into smaller, more manageable pieces.
Consider implementing a consistent naming convention for functions and variables to improve code readability.
test_strategy_suggestions: Adopt a test-driven development (TDD) approach to ensure that new features are covered by tests from the outset.
Implement integration tests to cover interactions between different components of the system.
Regularly review and update the test suite to ensure it remains relevant and effective as the codebase evolves.
next_steps: 1. Write unit tests for all uncovered functions, focusing on edge cases and error handling.
2. Address the lint issues and refactor complex functions to improve code quality.
3. Implement tests targeting specific mutation scenarios to improve the mutation score.
4. Review and enhance the overall test strategy to include integration tests.
5. Set up a continuous integration pipeline to automate testing and ensure coverage and mutation targets are met.
